cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I move around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🧀 People once thought I was made of cheese!
🌎 I'm Earth's closest neighbor in space.

cosmos.question: I am big and hot, and give the Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 You shouldn't look directly at me.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.
🌞 I am the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that twinkles at night and is very, very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have my own light.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am the planet you live on. I am mostly blue and green. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am the only planet known to have liquid water on its surface.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.
🚀 Astronauts travel from other planets to visit me.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, and I am known for my rusty color. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm sometimes called the chocolate planet.
🚀 People are planning to visit me soon!
🤖 Rovers have been exploring me for years.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My red spot is a giant storm!
🌙 I have lots of moons.
👑 I am named after a Roman god.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but very thin.
🧊 My rings are made up of many tiny pieces of ice and rock.
🪐 I am known for my spectacular rings.

cosmos.question: I'm a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun is a part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular in shape.
✨ I'm like a giant city of stars.
🥛 Our solar system lives in the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a frozen ball of ice and dust that leaves a bright tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball!
✨ My tail always points away from the Sun.
🌌 Some people think I brought water to Earth a long time ago.

cosmos.question: I am a place where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I'm like a cosmic vacuum cleaner.
🌌 I am formed when massive stars collapse.
🕳️ We can't see me directly, but we can see how I affect things around me.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make something sweet that you love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🌷 I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I build my home in the ground and carry crumbs all around. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony.
🌱 I often follow a trail.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I'm considered lucky and fly among flower pots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People think I bring good luck.
🔴 I have a rounded shape.
⚫ My spots help me camouflage.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a chrysalis. When I emerge, I have colorful wings and fly in the breeze. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I go through a transformation.
🌈 I am beautiful and fragile.
🌸 I drink nectar.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my prey. I have eight legs, but don't play all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home can be found in corners.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🪰 I eat insects that get stuck.

bug.question: I jump really high and have long back legs. I'm usually green and eat plants and begs. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🦵 My back legs are longer than my front legs.

bug.question: I like to light up the night. I have a glowing bottom and fly in the fading light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am often seen in the summer.
🔦 My light helps me find a mate.
🔥 My other name is lightning bug.

bug.question: I am long and thin, and I march in a line. I work with my friends, our teamwork is fine. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony underground or in logs.
🌱 I can carry things many times my own weight.
🍃 I'm always busy, gathering food and building.

bug.question: I’m a master of disguise; green, brown, or gray. I blend with the leaves, so predators stay away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look very much like a twig.
🌳 I eat leaves from trees.
🧍 I can be hard to spot!

bug.question: I am a nocturnal flier, often mistaken for butterflies. I am drawn to light and come in different sizes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am more active at night.
💡 I flutter around porch lights.
🎨 My wings are often more muted in color than butterflies.
